alert.note: Alert for Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 8:27PM CDT until April 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Souris River near Foxholm affecting Ward County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souris River near Foxholm. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 1571.0 feet, East bank begins to overflow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 1573.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage on Monday and continue falling into early this week. - Flood stage is 1573.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 1573.2 feet on 03/25/1996. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
